{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$3.3M in 2021-2022** on contracts with REPARATIONS NAVALES ET INDUSTRIELLES OCEAN.

Across 144 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 46 have at least one amendment (32%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 37% and the average number of amendments was 1.43. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$5.4M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.35 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$179.7K. The longest contract was 2.12 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$4.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
